    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tests for water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tests für Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essais pour l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Testes para a água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prove per acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμές για το ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pruebas para el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams demonstrate two methods of testing if a substance is water using copper sulphate and cobalt chloride paper.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anhydrous copper sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cobalt chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dryness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrated copper sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wetness</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen zwei Methoden der 
Prüfung, wenn eine Substanz Wasser mit Papier Chlorverbindung des 
kupfernen Sulfats und des Kobalt ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes démontrent deux méthodes de test
si une substance est l'eau en utilisant le papier de chlorure de 
sulfate de cuivre et de cobalt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas demonstram dois métodos de 
testar se uma substância for água usando o papel do cloreto do 
sulphate de cobre e do cobalt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi dimostrano due metodi di prova se 
una sostanza è acqua usando la carta dal cloruro del cobalto e del 
solfato di rame.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα καταδεικνύουν δύο μεθόδους εάν 
μια ουσία είναι ύδωρ που χρησιμοποιεί το θειικό άλας χαλκού και
το έγγραφο χλωριδίου κοβαλτίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas demuestran dos métodos de prueba
si una sustancia es agua usando el papel del cloruro del sulfato de 
cobre y del cobalto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wasserfreies kupfernes Sulfat</string>
